articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Modernized Ryuwon Footwear Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Modernized Ryuwon Footwear Factory
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju gave field guidance to the Ryuwon Footwear Factory which has been turned into a model in the country's footwear industry.
					 He went to the mosaic "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il seeing shoes produced by the Ryuwon Footwear Factory" and the monument to field guidance built in the compound of the factory to convey the immortal leadership feats of the WPK to posterity.
					
					 Noting that he felt as if he were seeing the smiling great leader, he said that officials and employees of the factory should produce quality and attractive shoes in a larger quantity for the people true to the great leader's noble intention.
					
					 He went round a newly arranged room for education in the revolutionary history and a room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He recalled that the Ryuwon Footwear Factory was built as the first injection-molded sports shoes producer of the country in November 1988 thanks to the warm loving care of leader Kim Jong Il who devoted his whole life to the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in Heaven.
					
					 Those rooms have been well built to ensure educational significance, he said, stressing the need to effectively conduct the education of employees through them in diverse forms and methods so that they can carry out their task more creditably with the pride and honor of working at the historic factory.
					
					 Going round the combined production control room and cutting, sewing, shoe-making and injection-molding shops, sci-tech room, designing room, products exhibition room and other parts of the factory, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un learned in detail about the renovation and production of the factory and the quality of its products.
					
					 The factory produces many varieties of quality and attractive sports shoes which can match with world famous sports shoes, he said, adding with broad smile on his face that he is very pleased to picture the children, sportspersons and other people enjoying those home-made sports shoes.
					
					 Then, he set forth the important tasks facing the factory.
					
					 Watching a panoramic view of the factory repeatedly, he highly appreciated the officials, scientists, technicians and builders for having turned the factory into a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 He stated that the buzzing sound for increased production at the factory seems to be powerful song of advance by the army and people who are building a prosperous socialist power with the great force of self-reliance and self-development, full of confidence in sure victory and optimism.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the Ryuwon Footwear Factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were An Jong Su, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and Kim Yong Su, Kim Yo Jong, Jo Yong Won and Pak Myong Sun, leading officials of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday with directors of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and members of the foundation and a delegation of the Russian Committee to Praise the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans who attended the 3rd enlarged meeting of the Board of Directors of the Foundation.

articles.title: Congratulations to New Kyrgyz President
articles.content:
Congratulations to New Kyrgyz President
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent    a congratulatory message to Sooronbay Zheenbekov on Oct. 17 on his election as president of the Republic of Kyrgyzstan.
					 Kim in the message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples, wishing the president success in his work for the prosperity and development of the country and the wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: Speech of Head of DPRK Delegation at IPU Session
articles.content:
Speech of Head of DPRK Delegation at IPU Session
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- An Tong Chun, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly heading a DPRK delegation, made a speech at the 137th General Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) held in Russia on Oct. 14-18.
					 It is an important issue for promoting mutual understanding and friendship among countries and regions and ensuring world peace and sustained development to encourage dialogue among nations and religions and develop cooperation based on cultural diversity, he said, and continued:
					
					 But quite contrary to the international community's general recognition and efforts, racial, cultural, religious and sexual discrimination and conflict as well as those in terms of political belief have become an acute and extreme international issue, going beyond the boundary of a country and region.
					
					 U.S. President Trump's remarks threatening total destruction of a sovereign state, a nation with differing ideology and social system from it, at the recent UN General Assembly discussing the world peace clearly proves who is a chief culprit destroying diversity of ideology, system, religion and culture.
					
					 The U.S. stages almost every day round the year large-scale war exercises aimed at regime change and collapse of social system in the DPRK after introducing huge nuclear strike means and special warfare troops into the Korean peninsula and areas around it.
					
					 Describing legitimate self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to protect its dignity and security in the face of the U.S. undisguised nuclear threat and blackmail as "threat to international peace and security", the U.S. is imposing the despicable and vicious economic blockade and sanctions unprecedented in history.
					
					 The "sanctions resolutions" seeking total blockade of even those fields directly linked with the people's livelihood, to say nothing of the external economic activities of our State, are illegal documents quite contrary to the UN Charter and the idea of the IPU, and a barbarous and unethical state-sponsored terrorism aimed to check modern civilization and bring back the dark medieval age.
					
					 As it had already clarified, the DPRK will never put on a negotiating table its nuclear deterrence for self-defence, as long as the U.S. nuclear threat and hostile policy continue, but will give further spurs to building strength for defending its sovereignty and right to existence and ensuring regional peace and security by achieving substantial balance with the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate's Speech at Fourth Committee of 72nd UNGA
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate's Speech at Fourth Committee of 72nd UNGA
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate addressed the Fourth Committee of the 72nd UN General Assembly on Oct. 17 which discussed "international cooperation in peaceful use of outer space".
					 He said:
					
					 Today, propelling the development of the economy through the exploration of outer space is becoming an international trend. In my country, too, under the coordinated leadership of the state, peaceful development of outer space is actively conducted in accordance with the 2016-2020 plan for national outer space development. 
					
					 In accordance with the 5-year plan for national outer space development, the DPRK will launch many more practical satellites that can contribute to the economic development and improvement of the people's living including geostationary satellite.
					
					 The DPRK government is making active efforts to achieve peaceful development of outer space while paying deep attention to the international exchanges and cooperation in the field of outer space on the basis of equality and mutual benefits. 
					
					 As a party to several space treaties, the DPRK's outer space development activities are completely on legal basis in all aspects. However, the U.S. going frantic to illegalize our development of outer space, claiming that it is against the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" of the UNSC. 
					
					 Those "sanctions resolution" cooked by the U.S. are no more than illegal documents that denounced peaceful launch of satellites as a "threat to international peace and security". 
					
					 The U.S. is the country that launched the largest number of satellites and yet it claims that our launch of satellites is a "threat to international peace and security". This is a preposterous allegation and extreme double standards.
					
					 Space Treaty clearly states that the outer space is a common asset of humankind and all countries can develop outer space without any discrimination. There is no article in the treaty that has mentioned the launch of satellites constitutes a threat to international peace and security nor is there any article stipulating that one cannot use ballistic rocket technology in launching a satellite. 
					
					 The U.S. is relying on illegal "resolutions" to make an issue of our righteous and legitimate launch of satellites. This is clearly a violation of international laws and outrageous infringement upon our sovereignty and rights to existence and development. 
					
					 Our peaceful development of outer space is a legitimate right of a sovereign state acknowledged by the international laws that no one could deny, and the status of the DPRK as a satellite manufacturing and launching state will never be changed though the U.S. denies it.
					
					 The DPRK will continue its peaceful development of space conquering greater part of space and strengthen international cooperation and exchanges in the field of artificial satellites.

articles.title: Senior Vice-President of NBC of U.S. Leaves
articles.content:
Senior Vice-President of NBC of U.S. Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Verdi David Joseph, senior vice-president of the NBC of the U.S., left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Press Conference at Russian Embassy Here
articles.content:
Press Conference at Russian Embassy Here
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held at the Russian embassy here Thursday in connection with the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students.
					 Present there were media persons of the DPRK, the correspondent of Xinhua News Agency of China here and Russian embassy officials.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, made a speech at the conference.
					
					 He said that the festival opened in Sochi of Russia with the participation of representatives of youth and students from various countries of the world is now successfully underway.
					
					 He stressed the festival would be a good opportunity to promote friendship and deepen mutual understanding among youths.
					
					 The participants watched a video on the opening ceremony of the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students. 
					
					 The ambassador answered the questions raised by reporters.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 3rd enlarged meeting of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, a delegation of Chongryon officials and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Thursday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Members Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Members Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Seyed Mohsen Emadi and his staff members visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the occasion of the DPRK-Iran friendship week.
					 The guests looked round various rooms of the museum, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory, firmly protecting the destiny of the country and nation and working military miracles to be specially recorded in the history of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book that he came to know well about the bravery displayed by the Korean people in the struggle against the U.S. imperialist invaders under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and he wished the Korean people bigger successes under the guidance of HE Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.
					
					 Meanwhile, staff members of the embassy did friendship labor at the DPRK-Iran Friendship Ripsok Co-op Farm in Mundok County.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in Kanggye City
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Kanggye City
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave a music and dance performance in Kanggye City, Jagang Province on Wednesday.
					 Among the audience were Kim Jae Ryong, chairman of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Hyong Gun, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, officials, technicians and workers of major industrial establishments in the province and working people, youth and students in Kanggye City.
					
					 The numbers of the performance which began with the national anthem included male solo and male chorus "Song Dedicated to the Motherly Party", light music and serial songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care" and female chorus and male chorus "Let's Keep the Revolutionary Faith to the Death".
					
					 The performers impressively represented thanks of all the service personnel and people for the Workers' Party of Korea which has led the cause of socialism to victory despite any tempest and change, holding high the Party flag of Juche as the ever-victorious banner.
					
					 The premiere in Kanggye evoked a lively response among the audience.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chol, vice-chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, said the songs advancing socialism which shook the land of Jagang Province redoubled the enthusiasm of the officials and people of the province.
					
					 Kim Hye Ran, manager of the Kanggye Unha Garment Factory, said that the performance depicted the mind of people of Jagang Province who live, deeply cherishing the feelings with the fatherly leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Sang Dok, a worker at the Huichon Precision Machine Plant, renewed his determination to glorify his life as creator of the Kanggye spirit at the worksite associated with the leadership feats of the fatherly leader.
					
					 The performance will go on.

articles.title: Global Handwashing Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Global Handwashing Day Marked in DPRK
 Chongjin, October 19 (KCNA) -- An event was held at Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK on Thursday to mark the Global Handwashing Day.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Urban Management, the Grand People's Study House, and relevant units in North Hamgyong Province, working people and schoolchildren and teachers and the representative and members of the UNICEF mission and officials of diplomatic missions of different countries here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event.
					
					 Speakers said that millions of children are suffering pneumonia and diarrhea worldwide every year, noting that handwashing with soap emerges as an urgent issue for families as well as child care centre and education, public health and public catering centres.
					
					 They underlined the need for everyone, children in particular, to know well about the method of handwashing and make it part of their life and habit.
					
					 At the end of the briefing on the importance of handwashing, the participants watched schoolchildren's methods of handwashing and enjoyed an art performance given by them.
					
					 Prior to this event, a gravity-fed water supply establishment, which was built in Kyongwon County with cooperation of UNICEF, began its functioning with due ceremony on the occasion.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Beat Their Uzbek Rivals 2-0
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Beat Their Uzbek Rivals 2-0
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The 2017 AFC U-19 Women's Championship started in Nanjing of China on Oct. 15.
					 Divided into two groups, the teams from eight countries and regions are to play group league matches and winners and runners-up from each group will advance into the semifinals of the championship.
					
					 The DPRK team belongs to group A, with Thai, Uzbek and Chinese teams.
					
					 The DPRK team defeated its Uzbek rival 2-0 on Wednesday.
					
					 In the first match with the Thai team on Oct. 15, it beat its Thai rival 9-0.
					
					 The DPRK team will play its last match with the Chinese rival on Oct. 21.

articles.title: Coal Output Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Collieries in the western area of the DPRK are concentrating their efforts on coal production.
					 As of mid-October, more than 30 cutting faces with big capacity were newly provided to increase coal production. 
					
					 The capital tunneling, preparatory tunneling and slope tunneling were carried out at 101-212 percent.
					
					 The Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex has topped its daily plan by introducing an advanced blasting method.
					
					 Collieries in the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex provided nine cutting faces and are enhancing tunneling speed with continuous drilling and blasting.
					
					 The Tukjang Area Coal Mining Complex also provided five cutting faces.
					
					 Meanwhile, collieries in Tokchon and Kaechon areas are introducing advanced mining methods suited to coal beds, raising the rate of mechanization, thus carrying out their daily assignments at 101 and 103 percent.

articles.title: Kim Kyong Yong, Promising Female Footballer of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Kyong Yong, Promising Female Footballer of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- "With only five years of playing experience under her belt, Kim Kyong Yong may well be a name that becomes synonymous with women's football in Asia for many years to come." This is an article posted by the Asian Football Confederation on its website.
					 Kim Kyong Yong, a forward of the DPRK team, rendered distinguished services to winning the 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship the third after 2007 and 2015, claiming the admiration of experts.
					
					 She scored five goals in the first match with the Bangladesh team in group league matches. She scored nine goals in five matches and was awarded the best player and top scorer prizes in the championship.
					
					 Former chief coach Song Sung Gwon told KCNA that fast speed, quick movement, correct judgment and position option are her good points.
					
					 Kim distinguished herself in the EAFF U-15 Girls Tournament held in April. She scored five goals in three matches.

articles.title: Pukchong County Lays Foundation for Increasing Fruit Production
articles.content:
Pukchong County Lays Foundation for Increasing Fruit Production
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Pukchong County in South Hamgyong Province, the DPRK is laying a foundation for increasing fruit production. It is a leading fruit producer of the country.
					 Orchards of several hundred hectares were created this year.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the county is planning to create more than 1,000 hectares of orchards within some years.
					
					 This year it built 10-odd stockbreeding bases to establish the food production cycle of fruit and animal husbandry on a high level. It is also speeding up the building of fruit storehouse with a capacity of several thousands of tons and a project for modernizing the fruit processing factory.
					
					 It finished the projects for expanding the roads, improving the Pukchong River and creating tens of hectares of windbreaks.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Injustice of U.S. "Theory of Nuclear Threat from North Korea"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Injustice of U.S. "Theory of Nuclear Threat from North Korea"
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs a commentary written by Jong Hyon disclosing the injustice of the "theory on threat from north Korea" by the U.S. disturbing the world.
					 Stressing the need for anyone to clearly know the truth of the U.S. "theory on threat from north Korea", if he or she is interested in peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and is desirous of justice and truth, the commentary clarifies who is threatening whom.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The DPRK has neither invaded any other country nor attempted to do it although it is countering the invasion moves of the sworn enemy U.S.
					
					 However, the U.S. is different from the DPRK. Historically, it is the chieftain persistently threatening the DPRK.
					
					 As recognized at home and abroad, the U.S. decades-long threats to the DPRK are an offspring of the U.S. wild ambition for world domination and supremacy, the basis of its state policy.
					
					 The DPRK can not compare with the U.S. in scale of territory or population. That's why the latter and its followers' talk about "threat" from the former and call for "sanctions" and "pressure" on the former have been rejected as sophism that can never work even on primary schoolchildren.
					
					 So, the DPRK's option is just and it can never be an object of criticism.
					
					 The essence of the "theory of north Korea's nuclear threat" persistently touted by the U.S. and its vassal forces is to make the DPRK's access to nukes "illegal". 
					
					 The U.S. is now persistently spreading the "theory of north Korea's nuclear threat". It was motivated by a wicked and cunning intention to turn the unpromising DPRK-U.S. confrontation structure into that between the DPRK and the international community and forcefully set big or small countries in the campaign of sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and thus topple it at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force is only for justice against aggression and tyranny, and herein lies the validity and reason of its access to nukes. 
					
					 The DPRK's option to protect the dignity, security and interests of tens of millions of people and open up the road for their independent development is quite right, and nobody should fault its bolstering of state nuclear force as "threat".
					
					 On the "best way to remove threats", the commentary says:
					
					 The sanctions and pressure on the DPRK are a never-to-be-condoned inhumane and brutal crime that should be settled with any time.
					
					 There is no reason for the innocent children, women, old persons and all other people of the DPRK to be subject to monstrous sanctions and economic blockade in peace time.
					
					 From the very day of the birth of the DPRK, its people have experienced sanctions and pressure, a war without gunfire, and advanced with self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force for their existence and development. They will never give up their treasured nuclear sword for justice which has been sharpened to defeat the U.S. imperialist aggressors, even if one of them remains alive on this land. The army and people of the DPRK are now burning their hearts with the will to win the final victory and force the U.S. to pay very high price for their blood.
					
					 A merchant of the White House, ignorant of the military affairs, dares talk about "the calm before the storm," "decapitation operation" and "immense nuclear preemptive attack". But, he is advised to properly roll his tongue after pondering over the consequences to be entailed by such balderdash.
					
					 The rabid man in the White House should be mindful that he will first face the immense volley of nuclear fire if he hopes to settle the DPRK-U.S. confrontation with nukes.
					
					 Referring to the way for settlement of the DPRK-U.S. problem, someone said that "a bell should be taken off by who put it", which should be appraised.
					
					 The nukes of the DPRK will open up a new chapter of history with its just victory in the turning point of world politics deciding independence or supremacy.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Holds U.S. Forces Accountable for Environmental Pollution
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Holds U.S. Forces Accountable for Environmental Pollution
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online newspaper Thongil News said that the "Measure Committee for Proper Transfer of U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan" made the "2017 environment, peace and Ryongsan march" in Seoul on Oct. 14.
					 The organization marched about 2km around the U.S. military base in Ryongsan to demand the de-pollution and transfer of the base. 
					
					 A survey of pollution in the Ryongsan base should be conducted and the U.S. forces should be held accountable for the pollution, it held.

articles.title: Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Struggle Headquarters Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Struggle Headquarters Formed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Seoul on Oct. 16 to form an anti-Trump and anti-U.S. struggle headquarters, according to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 The People's Democratic Party, the Peace Accord Movement Headquarters, and other political parties and organizations called this meeting when the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces began a joint naval drill against the DPRK.
					
					 The participants in the meeting made public an appeal titled "Let Us Avert War without Fail through Anti-Trump and Anti-U.S. Struggles!"
					
					 The appeal expressed the will to make all-out efforts to avert war and hold on the indomitable struggle to drive the U.S. troops from south Korea. 
					
					 They marched up to the "government" building.

articles.title: S. Korea: Press Conferences Held in Major Cities against North-targeted War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korea: Press Conferences Held in Major Cities against North-targeted War Drills
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War in south Korea called a news conference in Seoul on Oct. 16 to demand a halt to the south Korea-U.S. joint naval drill and repeal of the hostile policy towards the DPRK, according to the south Korean online paper Thongil News.
					 Speakers charged that the join naval drill aimed at preemptive attack on the DPRK is a dangerous military threat.
					
					 They declared that they would stage protest actions during the military exercises.
					
					 Similar conferences were simultaneously held in Pusan, Kwangju, Taegu and other areas of south Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Applies Worst Trade Barrier to S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Applies Worst Trade Barrier to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- According to data submitted to the "National Assembly" of south Korea on Oct. 11, the rate of regulation of trade by the U.S. against the south Korean goods increased 50 percent in the last 5 years.
					 The U.S. is intensifying the regulation of import centering on the fields of steel and metal, and now extending the scope of trade barrier to various fields such as chemistry, fiber and machine.
					
					 A lawmaker from the ruling party of south Korea said that the "government" failed to estimate the economic damage by the regulation of trade.

articles.title: Trump Ridiculed by S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
Trump Ridiculed by S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on October 17 said that maniac Trump is having a hard time. 
					 According to it, Trump is surrounded by foes on all sides, and there is widespread controversy against him even within the U.S. Republican Party and even his close aides set their backs on him.
					
					 Trump set forth a bill on tax reduction to tide over the crisis but no one knows whether that can pass Congress.
					
					 The director general of the International Atomic Energy Agency and the U.S. allies denounced Trump in unison after he voiced his will not to abide by the nuclear pact signed with Iran.
					
					 Therefore, Trump who invited international isolation out of his own accord due to the war moves against the DPRK has been rejected even by his allies over the Iranian issue.
					
					 The editorial revealed that Trump's hysteric strategy and anti-DPRK joint war drills make hot wind against the U.S. sweep across the south Korean land.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Un Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Un Introduced in Germany
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its internet homepage the full texts of President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence" and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on October 9 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 Kim Il Sung's work, made public on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), says that his 80 year-long life was the one of struggle in which he devoted himself to the people as their son, and clarifies that the WPK has firmly maintained the Juche-oriented stand and principle, always guided by the Juche idea, in the whole course of the revolution and construction. It also clarifies that the common task facing the Korean people and the world people is to build an independent new world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work, published on April 6, 2012, says that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea is a principled requirement to victoriously advance the cause of the Korean revolution. It also clarifies the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Personages of Myanmar, Brazil
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Personages of Myanmar, Brazil
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar and Brazil made public statements on Oct. 2 and 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said:
					
					 The WPK, founded by President Kim Il Sung has been developed into the invincible one under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people, holding in high esteem HE Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party, state and army, are vigorously advancing toward socialism, true to the intentions of the preceding leaders.
					
					 Thanks to HE Kim Jong Un the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will smash the moves of the hostile forces and surely win the final victory.
					
					 We extend invariable support to the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people.
					
					  Chairman Gabriel Goncalves Martinez and Secretary General Aleksandr Neves Rosendo da Silva of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said in their joint statement:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il is the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 His life ran through the firm conviction of the idea of President Kim Il Sung and socialism.
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il the Korean people could defend the gains of the revolution and resolutely cope with the outrageous provocations of the imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 We believe that under the outstanding leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un the Korean people will continuously achieve successes and powerfully encourage the struggle of the progressive people desirous of independence.

articles.title: Ethiopia-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee Formed
articles.content:
Ethiopia-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee Formed
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopia-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee was formed in Addis Ababa on October 9.
					Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the solidarity committee.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups and articles were posted on websites of different countries from Sept. 26 to Oct. 9 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its internet homepage the following article together with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il built the WPK into an invincible party winning only victories in implementing the cause of socialism, the cause of independence.
					
					 He made the WPK an ideological pure entity, an integral organization, which is carrying out the idea and leadership of the leader, and the party with strong mass foundation and the genuine motherly party devotedly serving the people.
					
					 Agence Congolaise d'Information carried the following article, accompanied with the picture of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un:
					
					 The Korean people will proudly build a socialist power in the near future as they are achieving great successes in economic construction by vigorously advancing in the spirit of Mallima under the wise guidance of the WPK holding Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Unpleased with this, the U.S. and its vassal forces are making desperate efforts to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should clearly understand that all the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK are the eruption of resentment and decisive resolution of its army and people.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the party leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la remodelada Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la remodelada Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon, remodelada excelentemente como unidad prototipica y fabrica modelo del sector de la industria de calzado de nuestro pais.
					Antes de todo, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un estuvo ante el mural de mosaicos "Dirigente Kim Jong Il viendo los calzados producidos en la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon", levantado en el recinto de la zapateria, y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion, construido para transmitir de generacion en generacion las indelebles hazanas de direccion de nuestro Partido.
					
					Parece que me encuentro realmente con el Dirigente con amplia sonrisa, dijo y continuo que en acato al noble espiritu del Dirigente, los funcionarios y empleados deben producir mucho mas calzados de buena calidad y apariencia para suministrarlos al pueblo.
					
					Y recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial, edificadas nuevamente.
					
					Alli recordo que la empresa fue fundada en noviembre de 1988 como primera base productora de zapatillas deportivas moldeadas por la inyeccion en nuestro pais gracias al ferviente amor al pueblo del Dirigente quien al tomar Iminwichon como su lema, dedico todo lo suyo para el pueblo.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente senalo que los dos lugares fueron acondicionados vividamente y con la significacion educativa y agrego que deben realizar efectivamente en estas salas la educacion de diversas formas y metodos para que los empleados de la fabrica tengan el orgullo y la dignidad de trabajar en un lugar glorioso y hagan bien sus faenas.
					
					En la sala de orden de la produccion combinada, el taller de corte, el de costura a maquina, el de calzados, el de inyeccion, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, la de disenos, la de exhibicion de articulos y otros puntos de la fabrica, el Maximo Dirigente hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de remodelacion y produccion y la calidad de los articulos.
					
					Las zapatillas deportivas producidas en la fabrica tienen muchas variedades y la buena calidad y apariencia y pueden competir dignamente con las otras famosas del mundo, evaluo y dijo con amplia sonrisa que a los habitantes, los ninos y deportistas gustaran los zapatos deportivos hechos en nuestro pais.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Contemplando reiteradamente el panorama de la empresa, el evaluo altamente los esfuerzos de los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y constructores quienes levantaron la fabrica como creacion monumental de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Y enfatizo que el ruido de la fabrica por el aumento de la produccion se oye como cancion de marcha vigorosa de todo el ejercito y pueblo que con la confianza y optimismo en la cierta victoria estan construyendo una potencia prospera socialista haciendo gala del autofortalecimiento.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su y los cuadros del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Su, Kim Yo Jong, Jo Yong Won y Pak Myong Sun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente de Kirguizistan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente de Kirguizistan
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica de Kirguizistan, Sooronbay Zheenbekov. 
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la RK se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses comunes de los pueblos de dos paises, el remitente deseo exitos en las tareas del destinatario por la prosperidad y desarrollo del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: An Tong Chun hace uso de la palabra en reunion de la Union Interparlamentaria
articles.content:
An Tong Chun hace uso de la palabra en reunion de la Union Interparlamentaria
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El jefe de la delegacion coreana An Tong Chun, vicepresidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, hizo uso de la palabra en la reunion plenaria de la 137a Asamblea General de la Union Interparlamentaria, efectuada en Rusia del dia 14 al 18.
					Fomentar los dialogos entre naciones y religiones y desarrollar la cooperacion a base de la diversidad cultural se presentan como asunto importante para facilitar el entendimiento mutuo y la amistad entre los paises y regiones y asegurar la paz y el desarrollo sostenible del mundo, adelanto el y prosiguio:
					
					La discriminacion y el antagonismo provenientes de las diferencias de razas y culturas, religiones y criterios politicos y sexos, que contravienen al entendimiento universal y los esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional, revisten el caracter extremista y se torna un problema mundial cada dia mas delicado sobrepasando los limites de un pais y una region.
					
					Hace poco, el presidente norteamericano Trump incurrio sin vacilacion alguna en la Asamblea General de la ONU, donde se discute la paz mundial, en el acto verbal antietico de destruir totalmente a otro pais soberano y una nacion entera con la idea y regimen diferentes. 
					
					Esta conducta violenta demuestra fehacientemente quien es el criminal principal que vulnera la diversidad de la idea y regimen, la religion y cultura.
					
					Cada ano, EE.UU. libra casi todos los dias los simulacros de guerra de gran dimension encaminados a lograr el cambio de nuestro poder y el derrumbe de nuestro regimen despachando hacia la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno un gran numero de medios de ataque nuclear y tropas especiales.
					
					Por otra parte, describe como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" las justas medidas de autodefensa, que toma la RPDC para defender su dignidad y seguridad frente a tales abiertas amenazas y chantajes nucleares, y le impone la mas brutal sancion y bloqueo economicos nunca vistos en la historia.
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion", que tienen por su objetivo bloquear totalmente no solo las actividades economicas con el extranjero de nuestro Estado sino tambien todos los espacios relacionados directamente con la vida popular, son los documentos ilicitos completamente opuestos a la Carta de la ONU y al ideal de la Union Interparlamentaria y constituyen ademas el antietico crimen de terrorismo de Estado que persigue romper la civilizacion moderna y darle marcha atras al mundo medieval.
					
					Como ha declarado ya, la RPDC jamas pondra sobre la mesa de negociaciones su disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo mientras persistan la amenaza nuclear y la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Dara mayor impulso a consolidar su fuerza para defender su soberania y derecho a subsistencia y garantizar la paz y la seguridad regionales al lograr el equilibrio sustancial con EE.UU.

articles.title: Representante coreano insiste en su legitimo derecho al desarrollo de cosmos
articles.content:
Representante coreano insiste en su legitimo derecho al desarrollo de cosmos
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El representante coreano intervino el dia 17 durante el debate de la agenda "Cooperacion internacional en el uso pacifico del cosmos" en la reunion del cuarto comite (Politica especial y Descolonizacion) de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					Hoy dia, impulsar el desarrollo economico a traves de la explotacion del espacio constituye una tendencia internacional, dijo y anadio que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tambien lleva adelante esa labor con fines pacificos segun el plan quinquenal estatal de desarrollo aeroespacial y bajo el control integral del Estado.
					
					De acuerdo con ese plan quinquenal, la RPDC lanzara al espacio mucho mas satelites de uso practico, incluso el geoestacionario, que contribuiran al desarrollo economico y al mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida del pueblo, apunto y prosiguio:
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC impulsa el uso pacifico de las actividades espaciales y por otra parte, tiene mucha atencion en el intercambio y la cooperacion internacionales en el sector sobre la base de igualdad y beneficio mutuo.
					
					Si bien las actividades espaciales de la RPDC, pais signatario de varios tratados referentes al cosmos, tienen el caracter legitimo, Estados Unidos las acusa de violar las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC adoptadas en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Esas "resoluciones de sancion" inventadas por EE.UU. no pasan de ser documentos ilegales que describen el lanzamiento de satelite por la RPDC con fines pacificos como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					
					EE.UU., lanzador del mayor numero de satelites en el mundo, califica de "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" el lanzamiento de satelite por parte de la RPDC, lo cual es absurdo y el climax de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					 El Tratado del Espacio estipula claramente que el espacio es la propiedad comun de la humanidad y todos los paises pueden desarrollarlo sin discriminacion alguna.
					
					 Ningun articulo de dicho tratado senala que el lanzamiento de satelite constituye la "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" ni define la prohibicion del uso de la tecnologia de cohete balistico en el lanzamiento.
					
					  El mismo hecho de que EE.UU. cuestiona nuestro justo y legitimo lanzamiento de satelite alegando esas "resoluciones" nominales deviene una violacion flagrante de la ley internacional y de nuestra soberania y derechos a existencia y desarrollo.
					
					  Nuestro desarrollo aeroespacial de caracter pacifico es el digno derecho independiente del Estado soberano reconocido por la ley internacional, el cual no puede impedir nadie.
					
					Y la posicion de la RPDC, pais fabricador y lanzador del satelite artificial de la Tierra, no se cambia nunca aunque la niegue un pais llamado EE.UU.
					
					  La RPDC acelerara en el futuro tambien el desarrollo aeroespacial con fines pacificos para conquistar el extenso universo e intensificara la cooperacion e intercambio internacionales en el lanzamiento de satelite.

articles.title: Vocero de CPME advierte a los agresores
articles.content:
Vocero de CPME advierte a los agresores
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Desde el dia 16, EE.UU. y la banda titere del Sur de Corea iniciaron en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos mas grandes en la historia, llevando asi la actual situacion tirante al umbral de guerra.
					Ya se desplegaron alli el colectivo de golpe de portaaviones nucleares Ronald Reagan, los 3 submarinos nucleares inclusive Michigan, mas de 40 buques de guerra incluyendo el destructor Aegis y los aviones de caza.
					
					EE.UU. y su lacayo surcoreano intentan dejar las propiedades estrategicas nucleares en el Sur de Corea y las aguas de su contorno, aunque terminaron los ejercicios, para introducirlas junto con el colectivo de ataque de portaaviones nucleares Theodore Roosevelt en el otro simulacro conjunto de ataque maritimo de gran envergadura a desarrollarse a fines del mes en curso.
					
					Y desde el 23 tratan de realizar los "ejercicios NEO" (operacion de transporte de las personas no combatientes" para evacuar al ultramar a los estadounidenses en el Sur de Corea, planeando asi crear de modo intencional la tension en visperas de la guerra.
					
					Esto demuestra que los enemigos tomaron por un hecho consumado el "ataque preventivo contra la RPDC" y acechan la oportunidad para estallar sin falta una guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Asi subrayo el vocero del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte en su declaracion fechada 18 y continuo:
					
					Los enemigos insisten en que los presentes ejercicios serviran de una muestra de las acciones de ataque real a asestarse contra nosotros. Pero ellos deben tener bien presente que tenemos la contramedida superintransigente de nuestro estilo tan suficiente que pueda aniquilarlos de un golpe.
					
					EE.UU., que ubico ante nuestra nariz los objetos de primer blanco de nuestro golpe, debe saber que sufrira un ataque inimaginable en un tiempo inesperado.
					
					Tampoco saldran vivos los titeres surcoreanos que convirtieron toda la extension surcoreana en un campo de guerra nuclear al introducir en su casa propia las propiedades estrategicas nucleares de EE.UU. sin percibir las futuras calamidades catastroficas.
					
					La peligrosa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, que se lleva cada momento mas a la fase imprevisible e inadmisible, demuestra claramente que el autor que amenaza la subsistencia y el desarrollo de nuestra nacion y la causa raigal de la guerra nuclear son EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar frustrara con la fuerza unida la demencia belica de EE.UU. y los maniacos surcoreanos que intentan salir del abismo de destruccion mediante la provocacion de guerra, y asestara golpe mas duro a los agresores y los provocadores que acarrean el nubarron de la guerra nuclear.
